definition: summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report/also written 匯總|汇总
summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report

sentences.english: Jia-wen Luo do the experimental investigation and make a research summary and finish the research report.
sentences.chinese: 由罗家文进行实验探究并将成果汇总并制成研究报告。

sentences.english: Today's chart of the day unites these two popular topics.
sentences.chinese: 今天的“今日图表”将汇总这两个时兴话题。

sentences.english: This budget indicates aggregate amounts for the various categories.
sentences.chinese: 这个预算是按不同的项次来汇总的。

sentences.english: Scrutinizing shipping window summary and coordinating with USO for any mistake occurred.
sentences.chinese: 仔细审核出货订单汇总如有任何错误和美国联系解决。

sentences.english: Here you can find a collection of travelogues of the places we have been travelled to recent years.
sentences.chinese: 在这里汇总了我们近几年来的一些游记。

sentences.english: What have we got if we combine these facets.
sentences.chinese: 把这些现象汇总一下看看我们得到了什么。

sentences.english: DataModel is the description of the selections and summary of datum.
sentences.chinese: 其中的数据模型就是对数据的选择与汇总的描述。

sentences.english: You need to select at least one column for adding subtotals .
sentences.chinese: 您必须选择至少一列作分类汇总。

sentences.english: Norse mythology was a collection of beliefs and stories shared by Northern Germanic tribes.
sentences.chinese: 挪威童话是北部日耳曼部落流传的故事汇总。

sentences.english: Summary tables of analytical runs of clinical or preclinical samples.
sentences.chinese: 临床或临床前样品分析批汇总表。

sentences.english: These are portals to all kinds of information on the subject.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个各种基于主题的相关信息汇总。

sentences.english: In the Use function box, select the function that you want to use to calculate the subtotals .
sentences.chinese: 在使用函数框里，选择要计算分类汇总的函数。

sentences.english: Sex shuffles up genes, continually producing new gene combinations.
sentences.chinese: 有性繁殖将基因汇总，不断产生新的基因组合方式。

sentences.english: For example, the summary output screen displays one or more summary statistics.
sentences.chinese: 例如，汇总输出屏幕显示了一个或多个汇总统计结果。

sentences.english: For example, the summary output screen displays one or more summary statistics.
sentences.chinese: 例如，汇总输出屏幕显示了一个或多个汇总统计结果。

sentences.english: Collection of hospital cost is a course of gathering cost.
sentences.chinese: 医院成本的归集是将成本进行汇总的过程。

definition: to arrange/to tidy up/to sort out/to straighten out/to list systematically/to collate (data, files)/to pack (luggage)
to report to one's superiors/to appear in the news/to reply to a letter
to sum up/to summarize/to conclude from facts/induction (method of deduction in logic)
to consult/to refer to/to look sth up in a reference source
